explains: v. 定做（custom-make 的过去式）

sentences.en: Furniture can also be custom-made to suit your own requirements.
sentences.cn: 家具也可以定做来满足你个人的要求。

sentences.en: These include custom-made navigation tools and night vision systems.
sentences.cn: 其中包括定制的导航工具和夜视系统。

sentences.en: Testing tools for the test scenario are custom-made.
sentences.cn: 测试场景使用的测试工具是定制的。
